stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

state PLAYER {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as PLAYER.(InitialState)

        IDLE

        IDLE : IDLE

        IDLE : enter / #123; stopAll()#59; uiIdle()#59; #125;

        LOADING

        LOADING : LOADING

        LOADING : enter / #123; startSpeech()#59; uiLoading()#59; #125;

        PLAYING

        PLAYING : PLAYING

        PLAYING : enter / #123; startMusic()#59; startAmbient()#59; syncAll()#59; uiPlaying()#59; #125;

        PLAYING : MUTE_MUSIC / #123; muteMusic()#59; #125;

        PLAYING : UNMUTE_MUSIC / #123; unmuteMusic()#59; #125;

        PLAYING : MUTE_AMBIENT / #123; muteAmbient()#59; #125;

        PLAYING : UNMUTE_AMBIENT / #123; unmuteAmbient()#59; #125;

        PAUSED

        PAUSED : PAUSED

        PAUSED : enter / #123; pauseAll()#59; uiPaused()#59; #125;

        REPLAYING

        REPLAYING : REPLAYING

        REPLAYING : enter / #123; restartSpeech()#59; uiLoading()#59; #125;

}

ROOT.(InitialState) --> PLAYER

PLAYER.(InitialState) --> IDLE

IDLE --> LOADING : PLAY

LOADING --> PLAYING : SPEECH_READY

PLAYING --> PAUSED : PAUSE_ALL

PLAYING --> REPLAYING : REPLAY

PAUSED --> PLAYING : RESUME_ALL

PAUSED --> REPLAYING : REPLAY

REPLAYING --> PLAYING : SPEECH_READY
Events
settings
